meanings.sent1: My digs are cozy and warm.
meanings.sent2: She found new digs in the city.
meanings.sent3: His digs are so neat, it's like a mini hotel!
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house looked like spooky digs.
meanings.sent5: The dog made a cozy bed in his digs.

meanings.definition: To break up, turn over, or loosen (earth) with a spade or other implement.
meanings.sent1: Dad digs the garden every spring.
meanings.sent2: The farmer digs the soil before planting.
meanings.sent3: The kids dug up the sand at the beach.
meanings.sent4: She digs into the earth with determination.
meanings.sent5: The archaeologist digs carefully to uncover artifacts.

meanings.sent2: She digs spending time with her friends.
meanings.sent3: He digs the idea of a surprise party.
meanings.sent4: They dig the taste of homemade cookies.
meanings.sent5: The kids dig playing in the park.
